snippet: Tairod Nathan Webster Pugh is accused of attempting to provide support to terrorists while he was in the Middle East.
abstract: New Jersey Air Force veteran Tairod Nathan Webster Pugh pleads not guilty to charges that he tried to support the Islamic State; prosecutors say that Pugh planned to travel to Syria and join the Islamic State during trip to Middle East, before he was stopped by suspicious Turkish authorities.
lead_paragraph: Tairod Nathan Webster Pugh is accused of attempting to provide support to terrorists while he was in the Middle East.

headline.main: Air Force Veteran Pleads Not Guilty in ISIS Case
headline.print_headline: Veteran Pleads Not Guilty in ISIS Case

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
